He quickly questions his sanity, that can't be right, if i was hallucinating, why does everything then feel so real? he looks around at the strange people and their outfits, wondering if he's in a new place.
He smiles, finally accepting his reality, i'm in a different universe?
A woman with horns asks a man in a robe, high priest, is he really the one that the prophecies speak of?
The older woman explains, the legends say that the one that wields the magic ring which is like the queen's is the chosen one.
He looks confused and asks, what magic ring... ? the woman with horns stares at him, while the older woman also watches closely.
He holds up a necklace with a red gem and asks, are you talking about this thing?
A hand holds a similar gold ring with a red gem.
She excitedly exclaims, that's right, that magic ring!  she quickly compares it to her own, it's identical to mine!
If i wasn't ganked at mid once, i would've had a perfect game. My name is xiang ye, he types, slightly frustrated.
He spends his days drawing and playing video games.
Initially i thought my entire summer was going to continue like this, i didn't think... I would become another world's savior, he thinks, lying in bed.
I'm so damn tired, i'll play again tomorrow... He mumbles, looking up with a tired expression.
When did my ceiling look like this?... He wonders, seeing a blurry image of the queen.
She looks up, seemingly observing her surroundings.
You, who are you? why are you inside my house? idiot, this place isn't your home! she exclaims, pointing at him.
This... What is this place? am i hallucinating from playing too many video games? he wonders, looking around at the strange scene.
Since physical attacks won't work, we can try this! one says, grinning widely. I guess the time has come... It's been a while! another replies, also grinning.
Shut it! the woman sharply says.

The monster shakes violently, bound tightly by chains.
The monster continues to shake, held fast by the glowing chains.
The large creature lies on its back, exhaling smoke.
He's finally down! it seems like he ate an entire wasteland of living organisms, somehow it doesn't seem like he's just a level b grade enemy! no, we're a step behind, fall back!! another shouts.
He looks down worriedly at the red beam coming from the creature.
That thing, they say, staring at the red beam.

Huh? he says, looking to the right in confusion.
Huh? it says, looking to the right as a black creature flies nearby.
Everyone, get behind me! he shouts, extending his arm out.

What's going on!? there's trouble! not even a warning before letting out an attack like this! one exclaims in shock.
But this ability was clearly used to suppress the demon's attacks... Another says, a dragon's shadow looms behind them.
They run away quickly, dodging shards of blue energy.
Thank goodness it's not an enemy... Sigh, he says, wiping sweat from his forehead.
She steps firmly on the ground, sending dust flying up.
Killing that thing was like crushing a bug, yet you guys needed the queen to come over at this time to do extermination! she says smugly.
She floats tiredly, after coming to this world, my head has been a mess...
It looks like i'll still have to teach you a lot, this way, you'll truly become the king of this kingdom, she says with a smirk, pointing at him.
Err... Ha, haha... But, what i can say for sure is that i miraculously became the ruler of these lands... He says, smiling nervously and sweating.
Oh, and she's my wife! she says, smiling and holding a blue ball.
The xiu luo plains has many tribes, including humans, demons, and other creatures.
Within these tribes, the human tribe and the demon tribe are the strongest, she says, looking at him.
The two tribes erupted into full-out war a few centuries ago over essential resources. Both tribes became crippled over time, the human tribe was the first to ask for peace, she explains.
And then the demon tribe... She continues, gesturing to the figures on the table.
The demon tribe's queen, isabella osa, agreed to sign the treaty for peace, she adds with a smirk.
